name: asAffili
author: alexandersuess

sections.description:
asAffili is an simply and easy-to-use Plugin to create a product-site with products from affiliate-datafeeds

You can:

  • Create data feeds imports
  • Link product-categories to own categories
  • Display the imported products

Documentation

You can find additional information on the website https://www.asuess.de/asaffili/asaffili-plugin/

Plugin Support

If you have any problem with asmember plugin, please visit the plugin site and post it on the support forum or send us a contact:
https://www.asuess.de/asaffili/asaffili-plugin/

You can create a free forum user account and ask your questions.

Language Translations

The following language translations are already available:

  • English
  • German
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/asaffili directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the asAffili->Options screen to configure the plugin
  4. Create a Page, that display the imported products with Shortcode
  5. Create the imports to import the data-feeds from affiliate-networks
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Fixed Bugs

1.0.2

  • Fixed Bugs

1.0.1

  • Fixed Bugs
  • Default-Image for Products without a Product-Image

1.0

  • First version.

short_description: asAffili is an affiliate tool. It allows you to import csv data feeds provided by affiliate networks.
